title: Typography magazine
content:
Not quite sure if this is posted at the right location, but I'll have a go anyway.  
Now that the dollar is low, I might consider subscribing to a typography magazine.  
Does anyone have any suggestions ?

Thanx :-)
author: Ulakanakulot

comments.content:
CMYK sometimes has nice design stuff in it.  
Or I really like Communication Arts magazine. Really nice award-winning stuff there.

Enjoy!
